content: To be honest, I avoid asking for advice most of the time. I do this because people love giving advice, even when it is not necessary. In addition, some advice is just to related to gossip and unimportant things. However, in the case presented in the post, the word advice seems to be adequate since it stimulates participation. Especially, in the enterprise world, when feedback is requested, people tend to say that everything is going well, avoiding giving honest critiques. People probably act in this way because of some kind of fear such as ‘I can be fired’.
